entry.title: Non-Alcoholic Beers
entry.summary:
My Non-Alcoholic Beer Journey
In November 2010 I had my last alcoholic drink and in the last 10+ years the world of non-alcoholic beers has come on leaps and bounds.
So here is a story of my Non-Alcoholic Beer Journey as I have taken at least one picture of every beer (50 at time of writing) I have had over the years, but have 100s of pictures in my non alcoholic beer album on google photos...

entry.title: All Change Please!
entry.summary:
Last week it was announced by my manager that I would be leaving Zurich after 14 years of working here. This was only the second time in my life I have handed my resignation in to a manager if you don’t include leaving my Saturday job at Sainsburys which I can’t remember how I did that with it being such a long time ago!
Now I have changed a lot over the past 14 and not only my physical appear...
